hero.subtitle: Attorney at the Nice Bar
hero.name: Eva Ballin
hero.description: Specialized in criminal law, white-collar crime, and victims' rights. Recognized expertise in supporting victims of domestic and family violence.

about.label: About
about.title: Eva Ballin, your lawyer in Nice
about.description1: As an attorney at the Nice Bar, I put my expertise at the service of my clients with rigor and humanity. Specialized in criminal law, white-collar crime, and victims' rights, I assist individuals and businesses with their most complex legal issues.
about.description2: My international background has allowed me to develop a global vision of law and an essential adaptability in an ever-evolving legal world.

expertise.title: Recognized expertise
expertise.description: Over 15 years of experience in criminal law with specialization in victims' rights and domestic violence.

international.title: International dimension
international.description: Experience in Singapore, Dubai, Luxembourg, and Monaco. Fluent practice in French and English.

human.title: Human approach
human.description: Attentive listening and personalized support. Each case is handled with the utmost care.

rigorous.title: Rigorous defense
rigorous.description: Total commitment to defending your rights and interests, with meticulous preparation of each case.

expertises.label: Areas of Practice
expertises.title: My Expertise
expertises.description: With over 15 years of experience in criminal law, I support you in all aspects of your defense or your rights as a victim.

penal.title: Criminal Law
penal.description: Defense of individuals involved in criminal proceedings. Assistance during police custody, immediate appearance, investigation, and criminal court hearings.

business.title: White-Collar Crime
business.description: Support for executives and companies facing economic offenses: misuse of corporate assets, fraud, breach of trust, money laundering.

financial.title: Financial Criminal Law
financial.description: Expertise in stock market offenses, tax fraud, corruption, and financial regulation violations.

victims.title: Victims' Rights
victims.description: Support for victims of criminal offenses in their legal proceedings. Civil party constitution and obtaining compensation.

domestic.title: Domestic Violence
domestic.description: Specialized support for victims of domestic violence. Protection orders, complaints, support throughout the procedure.

family.title: Family Law
family.description: Divorce, separation, child custody, alimony. Family mediation and amicable dispute resolution.

domestic.label: Specialization
domestic.title: Domestic and Family Violence
domestic.description1: Domestic violence is a painful reality affecting thousands of people. As a specialized attorney, I am committed to supporting victims with humanity and professionalism.
domestic.description2: Whether you are a victim of physical, psychological, economic, or sexual violence, I help you assert your rights and protect yourself and your children.
domestic.description3: My approach is based on listening, respecting your pace, and implementing a legal strategy tailored to your situation.
domestic.emergency: If you are in immediate danger, contact 17 (Police) or 3919 (Women Violence Info).

contact.label: Contact
contact.title: Book an appointment
contact.description: For any consultation or information request, please do not hesitate to contact me. I will respond as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Legal area

footer.description: Law firm specialized in criminal law, white-collar crime, and victims' rights. Recognized expertise in domestic and family violence.
